summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MITA ICT chatbot feature. All core functionality working: chatbot appears after cookie consent, AI responses via Claude Sonnet 4, multi-turn conversations, lead capture, admin login, and chat sessions API. All public pages load correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Admin dashboard does not have a UI tab/section to view chat sessions. API endpoints exist (/api/admin/chat-sessions) but no frontend component to display them.

action_items: Add Chat Sessions tab to Admin Dashboard to view captured leads and conversation history
critical_code_review_comments: Admin dashboard missing Chat Sessions UI - API exists at /api/admin/chat-sessions but no frontend component to display sessions

success_rate.frontend: 95% (all features working except Chat Sessions admin view)

seed_data_creation: Created test chat sessions during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All chatbot features working. Backend API for chat sessions exists and tested. Frontend needs Chat Sessions tab in admin dashboard to view leads.

features_tested.chatbot_toggle_after_cookies: PASS - Chatbot button appears only after accepting cookies
features_tested.chatbot_opens_with_greeting: PASS - Chatbot opens and displays greeting message
features_tested.chatbot_accepts_input: PASS - User can type and send messages
features_tested.chatbot_ai_responses: PASS - Claude Sonnet 4 responses received correctly
features_tested.multi_turn_conversation: PASS - Session maintained across multiple messages
features_tested.admin_login: PASS - Login works with provided credentials
features_tested.admin_chat_sessions_api: PASS - API returns chat sessions correctly
features_tested.admin_chat_sessions_ui: MISSING - No UI in admin dashboard to view sessions
